SECTION_CONTENT:
Handling Wear personal protective equipment. Ensure adequate ventilation. Keep away from open
flames, hot surfaces and sources of ignition. Take precautionary measures against static
discharges. Use only non-sparking tools. Use explosion-proof equipment. Do not breathe
vapors or spray mist. Do not get in eyes, on skin, or on clothing. To avoid ignition of vapors
by static electricity discharge, all metal parts of the equipment must be grounded.
Storage Flammables area. Keep containers tightly closed in a dry, cool and well-ventilated place.
Keep away from heat and sources of ignition. Keep container tightly closed in a dry and
well-ventilated place.
